column1: Little Goat Diner////The second visit was for breakfast. Arrived early (7:30a) to be told they were not open because they were having mechanical issues. They directed us to the bakery (just east of the restaurant space) and gave me a coupon for a free coffee. We waited for about 15 minutes and were sat. Considering everyone was sat at one time
column2: the service staff and kitchen handled it amazingly well. Our server
column4: offered his opinion on his favorites and promptly gave my dining companion the gluten-free menu when she said she had an intolerance. I ordered the kimchi-bacon-egg-pancake-tasty thing and it was really delicious!
